overview:
Sales & Marketing Director APAC for dianomi - online performance marketing.

Launching dianomi in Sydney and across APAC - premium online lead generation for finance and automotive â€“ our clients include JP Morgan, CMC, Fidelity, GFT, Hargreaves Lansdown, Investec, Aberdeen Asset Management, BMW, Lexus, Mercedes, Land Rover and our publishers Morningstar, Reuters, London Stock Exchange, The Daily Telegraph, Mail Online, Yahoo Finance and The Guardian.

Oversaw the launch of Time Out Singapore’s website in 2007/08, growth in Time Out Sydney’s site in 2009/10, Time Out Sydneyâ€™s iPhone app and launch of Time Out Melbourneâ€™s website in 2010 & new Time Out Sydney site in 2011. Extensive experience of SEO, SEM, digital advertising, mobile, social media, pages & advertising, analytics and email marketing.

Speaker at: PR 3.0 - PR & Communications AIM Networking Week - Making social media work for you Speaker, panelist and workshop facilitator at CeBIT Sydney WebForward 2011 - mobile strategy ad:tech Sydney and Melbourne 2011 EMSA - Email Marketing Summit Australia - Sydney â€“ November 2010 Panelist at AIMIA Digital Summit 2010 - Sydney The Public Sectors: 3.0 and the future of Social Media - Canberra ADMA Forum July 2010 Web 3.0 - The future of social media, Sydney, 2010 ad:tech Sydney in 2010 ad:tech Sydney in 2009

Over 50 appearances in Londonâ€™s High Court, County & Magistrates Courts and before local authority committees.

Director level planning and decision making for over 15 years.
